name: The Tarmac Truck
description:
In a world of eternal night, only one trucker can restore the roads of ages past. Reconnect desolate settlements and explore the hills of a world in decline.

Get lost in a world lost to time and space. Confusion is comfort where time is wasted.

CONTROLS: 

  • WASD to drive
  • SPACE to lay road
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left Click to HONK
  • Right Click to Slow Time
